page.title: 19 HAVENSTREET RAILWAY 2
page.content: The preservation society was renamed 'The Isle of Wight Steam Railway Company Ltd' in 1971. Attractions include a museum, souvenir shop and a place for refreshments. Renovation is now being done by unemployed people under the Youth Training Schene. This gives about a dozen local youngsters work opportunity. Many original notices and buildings still remain today. Buildings being built in 1985 include a building which will be a larger museum. A commemoration stone laid by the Lord Lieutenant of the Island marks the start of this project.
